package.name: Net_Geo
package.summary: Geographical locations based on Internet address

release.state:
stable
* Added use of pear Cache::Function * Added additional use of localizer API (see READ me for URL)
Geo.php README

release.notes: Very simplistic caching used which could do with a tidy up. Although the NetGeo server will accept domain names, the quality is very sporadic. Use IP or AS numbers for a better result.
